title: A new battle: Veterans more likely to have heart disease

title_detail.value: A new battle: Veterans more likely to have heart disease

summary: After the war is over, veterans face a new threat. They are more likely to have heart disease at a younger age than nonveterans, and this could herald a new health crisis on the horizon.

summary_detail.value: After the war is over, veterans face a new threat. They are more likely to have heart disease at a younger age than nonveterans, and this could herald a new health crisis on the horizon.
